title: How to Hire a Landscaping Company

steps.headline: Decide what landscaping service you are looking for because different companies provide different services such as irrigation, lighting, design, and maintenance.
Once you decide the type of service you want you need to make sure the company can provide that service and that they have experience in that area of landscaping.
steps.description: You do not want to being paying for a company to learn as they go on your property and on your dime.

steps.headline: Look for testimonials from friends or family that currently have a landscaping company they are using.
steps.description: There are so many landscaping companies that it is important to make sure you are getting the best service and a fair price.

steps.headline: Compare prices with the companies that you decide can provide a quality service you need.
steps.description: It is not always the best idea to go with the lowest prices because many times that is a red flag that there services might not be as good.

steps.headline: Search the web for landscaping directories that list professional landscaping companies.
steps.description: If a company is willing to pay to advertise there service in most cases they are a serious company that will provide good service. Large directors are usually not the best because they will let almost any company list, so local directories are preferred when searching for listings.

steps.headline: Don't sign up for a long term contract, but to hire them for a month or so to make sure there service meets your standards.

text: Decide what landscaping service you are looking for because different companies provide different services such as irrigation, lighting, design, and maintenance.  Once you decide the type of service you want you need to make sure the company can provide that service and that they have experience in that area of landscaping. You do not want to being paying for a company to learn as they go on your property and on your dime. Look for testimonials from friends or family that currently have a landscaping company they are using. There are so many landscaping companies that it is important to make sure you are getting the best service and a fair price. Compare prices with the companies that you decide can provide a quality service you need. It is not always the best idea to go with the lowest prices because many times that is a red flag that there services might not be as good. Search the web for landscaping directories that list professional landscaping companies. If a company is willing to pay to advertise there service in most cases they are a serious company that will provide good service. Large directors are usually not the best because they will let almost any company list, so local directories are preferred when searching for listings. Don't sign up for a long term contract, but to hire them for a month or so to make sure there service meets your standards.
